prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The core components of Promptbook include the Core project (documentation of basic concepts), Book language (markdown-like language for defining entities), TypeScript implementation, and Promptbook studio for writing and publishing Books.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
